events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin review shortly.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering department for the backend developer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidate's journey through the hiring process for the engineering team.
Completed the initial screening call to assess the candidate's background and confirm technical skills for the software engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding with the technical interview.
Scheduled the technical interview for the backend development position with the candidate on May 20th at 10 AM.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully showing strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Arranged an HR interview to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and company policies scheduled for May 23rd.
The candidate had a positive HR interview experience, confirming alignment with company values and expectations.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate for the engineering position, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided feedback on the offer, expressing enthusiasm and willingness to join the engineering team.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to begin their role as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has started, including setup of development tools, introduction to the team, and access provisioning.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the new software engineer fully onboarded and integrated.
